arts.ttl: Man City 3-1 Bournemouth: Kevin De Bruyne moves level with Cesc Fabregas in all-time Premier League list on Etihad farewell
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne equals a long-standing Premier League record held by Cesc Fabregas during Manchester City's 3-1 win over Bournemouth

arts.ttl: Manchester City and Omar Marmoush give Kevin De Bruyne fitting send-off
arts.sum: Marmoush’s stunning strike set up a 3-1 win over Bournemouth as the Etihad Stadium said farewell to De Bruyne.

arts.ttl: Man City-Bournemouth confirmed XIs: Rodri returns for De Bruyne’s Etihad swansong
arts.sum: Manchester City and Bournemouth confirm their starting lineups for tonight’s Premier League clash at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Bournemouth - Premier League: Live score, team news and updates as Kevin De Bruyne STARTS his final home game as Pep's side look to bounce back from FA Cup final defeat and go third
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Manchester City welcome Bournemouth to the Eithad plus updates from Crystal Palace vs Wolves in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: How to watch Man City vs Bournemouth: TV channel and live stream for Premier League today
arts.sum: City must swiftly bounce back from the disappointment of an FA Cup final defeat to Crystal Palace
